post:
Cloudean Infotech is a technology company that builds powerful, secure and scalable infrastructure for businesses.
Our highly experienced IT professionals specialize in working as your partner to fully understand your unique business needs. We’ll craft a secure end-to-end solution that meets your current business needs and supports your future goals to drive results.

Premium Reseller Hosting
Designed to deliver foremost performance!

Decentralized execution of services to avoid single point of failure. Web Server, DNS, Backups services run individually on completely different infrastructure.

White labelled services :
DDoS protected AnyCast DNS [24 POPs]

Support :

  • Daily, Weekly backup schedule [90 Days Retention]
  • Protection against DDoS attack
  • Technical & migration assistance
  • Uptime monitoring : services & hosted domains
  • 99.99% Uptime SLA

Account features :

  • Your choice of control panel : Plesk Obsidian
  • Secured by ImunifyAV+
  • Operating System : CentOS 7 64 bit
  • MariaDB [MySQL]
  • Node.js
  • PHP [7.1,7.2,7.3]
  • Free SSL [Let’s Encrypt]
  • Plesk Application Catalogue
  • WordPress Toolkit

Hostballs exclusive promotion! 40% recurring lifetime discount!
Promotional code: HBRH40

No Overselling
Limited Clients and Generous Allocation of Resources

Specifications -
Shared Intel® Xeon® Gold CPU(s)
Shared DDR4 ECC memory
UN-metered Data Transfer [100 Mbps]
